reviews.review: The game that you hate but love at the same time

Dead By Daylight is an interesting concept in and of itself, and happens to be a fun game to play especially with the diverse character select and killers available (especially ones like Ghost Face XD) 10/10 Good Game
we did a pretty good job so far

My Girlfriend got me into this game and I love it!! I've ended up buying all the killers and I always have so much fun playing both survivor and killer in game, definitely worth a try if you love jump scares!
it's good game when people aren't being dumb
Hard to get the hang of, but very fun after you learn the mechanics of the game.
Really cool game with much content and with more and more Updates. Of course there are toxic players, but not everyone is toxic.
Iam spooked, empfohlen von der Geist.

Before I get to my review I want to say that I mostly played Killer while avoiding playing survivor since I disliked the survivor playstyle. This is a game that I've been playing on and off since long ago (I think when The Pig was released?) and each time I get back into it I usually enjoy it a fair bit. I played the Dbd either trying to get achievements or just doing what I thought was dumb and although that meant I would usually stay pretty low ranked (10-15) I always enjoyed trying to find survivors and seeing what build they were using.While I do enjoy the game after a while the match-ups get pretty bland with everyone I'm up against running the same old DS-Unbreakable-Deadhard and after I reach that point I usually quit the game for a short while.

While the game is fun and you do get to see unique builds sometimes most of the time there is a set meta that most people follow. The community is also not the best since they will always try to find a fault in your gameplay to call you out on after the game ends although it's easily circumvented by just ignoring them. While not my favorite game I do intend to come back to it every now and then to see what has changed.
I think we did a pretty good job so far.

This game defininetly has it's ups and downs. Whilst you can have fun juking the killer with your friends for hours, you can also easily find yourself on the other side, or to be more specific, camped on the hook or tunneled for the rest of the match. Definietly my biggest love hate relationship so far.
